title: Development, Evaluation, and Assessment of Large Language Models (DEAL) Checklist: A Technical Report
details: S Tripathi, D Alkhulaifat, FX Doo, P Rajpurkar… - NEJM AI, 2025
abstract: Large language models (LLMs) have advanced artificial intelligence research in medicine, especially in natural language processing tasks. However, the nascent evolution of LLM practices presents challenges to the transparency, reproducibility …
